raw_comment:
What I noticed is that NFL coaches of color are only 13% and that the MLB coaches of color are only 20% I also noticed that the MLS coaches of color are only 41%.

What I wonder is why the NFL coaches of color’s percentage is so low and that the MLB players of color’s percentage is only 40%. I also wonder why the WNBA players of color’s percentage is so high.
ace_sentences: I noticed that the percentage of NFL coaches of color is 13%.
I noticed that the percentage of MLB coaches of color is 20%.
I noticed that the percentage of MLS coaches of color is 41%.
I wonder why the percentage of NFL coaches of color is so low.
I wonder why the percentage of MLB players of color is 40%.
I wonder why the percentage of WNBA players of color is so high.
